install.name: Search - GCalendar
install.author: G4J Project
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License.
install.description: Allows Searching of events in the calendars specified in the GCalendar component.

param.name: calendarids
param.label: Select Calendars
param.description: The calendars, if none is selected it searches in all calendars.

param.name: search_limit
param.label: Search Limit
param.description: Number of Search items to return

param.name: pastevents
param.label: Include Past Events
param.description: If past event should be included into the search result.
